text_block_list.text:
The day after the failed scout of Gold City. While 
I was walking along the tree-lined streetー

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
After all, the one who was arguing on the course 
a while ago was City-san, right?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
The other party she was arguing with was a trainer, right? It was 
pretty loud, I wonder if it’s okay…
I wonder if something happened. Let’s go check it out…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ーThen, you mean. I don’t need to train!?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No-no, that’s not what I mean. I just don’t want to put on extra 
muscles and break down your current body figure, I told you I 
wouldn’t do anything that would hurt your body!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
More importantly let’s polish your form more! After all, you have 
to run beautifully. Oh, you have to practice winning live too!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Then, will I get faster? Will I be able to win a race?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you mean that? It will be okay-okay, I’ll do the rest well 
there. All you have to do is run and win the race.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Then your fame won’t be hurt! More beautiful than 
anyone, everyone will be captivated by Gold City’s 
run and win! It’s the perfect plan, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Wrong. Wrong. Wrong, wrong!! I didn’t want to be like that…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Hey… Why?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You said that. “I will make you the top Horse Girl there is”. 
“The No. 1 Horse Girl who shines on the turf”

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But… why are you…!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ehh? Well, my feelings haven’t changed. 
I mean you, you are “Gold City” right?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: You are that famous, cool and composed model!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It will be okay I said, leave it all to me! I’ll think about 
everything, about your image, and how to make it shine.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
All you have to do is follow the instructions! That’s for your 
sake too. That’s what a trainer is for, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh…? A, you… why…

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
…Hoy, who the hell are you. Would you mind 
as an outsider to shut your mouth?
choice_data_list: If you’re a trainer, listen to her more!
If you’re a trainer, listen to her more!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What did you say? You arrogant…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……ah.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
A, hoy!…What is it, you don’t understand. Even though I will 
be going all the way to make you shine.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What a bad temper~… That’s enough, 
I’ll find another horse girl.
…I couldn’t possibly leave Gold City alone. Let’s go after her!

I searched all over the school, but I couldn’t 
find her. Where else is leftー

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Woah!? What-what!?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You startled me~… seriously, what’s going 
on~? Are you going after City?

I explained the situation, and asked her if she 
had any idea of where Gold City could be.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hmm, that’s why you’re looking for City?…Ehe~, suspicious.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You want to scout City because of her good looks anyway too, 
right~? Ya, seriously her looks are good. But this is hella bad.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But then, the difference between manager-san and 
you won’t change if you know what I mean~…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Just in case, let me hear it. Why are you obsessed with City?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Tosen Jordan:『Support her』, is it~…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
By the way, that, have you thought 
about how『I want to support her』?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Nothing yet!? E, for real? Isn’t that bad?
choice_data_list: I don’t know anything about her yet
I don’t know anything about her yet

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: …Huh?
choice_data_list: I want to talk to her, I want to know her

text_block_list.text:
ーAfter that, I want to discuss and decide what to 
do with her. So I appealed to Tosen Jordan.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: …Hm, hmmm? Ya well, how would I know~…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Eh, what is that mood like waiting for me. I’m in trouble~…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Wooo, don’t come any closer~! I don’t want anymore~!!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: ーGe, it’s coming~!? Jordan, doesn’t know for real!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: No way-no way, stay away~!!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Phew, if you come this farー

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, you’re still chasing~!? Please let go of me~!!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ahh~! Geez, I don’t know, I don’t know! 
Even if you ask me, I’m in trouble~!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I don’t know where City could have gone, 
other than about the riverbed…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, shoot.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Woah, hey a moment!?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, don’t tell her that I was the one who told you!? For real 
don’t tell, okay~!? When City gets mad she is seriously scary!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey! Are you listening~!!
